file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 28-21-03-05 - RELIEF VALVE - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL RELIEF VALVE - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the check of the check/relief valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CHECK RELIEF VALVE - FUNCTIONAL ALL 28-21-03-700-801-A ♦ CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 28-21-03 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-21-03-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CHECK RELIEF VALVE - FUNCTIONAL CHECK A. General (1) To do the check, it is necessary to remove the check valve from the aircraft fuel system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 28-21-03-000-801-A/400 CHECK/RELIEF VALVE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 28-21-03-000-802-A/400 CHECK/RELIEF VALVE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 28-21-03-400-801-A/400 CHECK/RELIEF VALVE - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 28-21-03-400-802-A/400 CHECK/RELIEF VALVE - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing stub I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Remove the check/relief valve ( AMM TASK 28-21-03-000-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 28-21-03-000-802-A/400) as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 28-21-03 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Functionally Check Relief Valve SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do the functional check (on a bench) of the check/relief valve. Refer to the last revision of Parker Hannifin ACMM 28-22-09. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the check/relief valve ( AMM TASK 28-21-03-400-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 28-21-03-400-802-A/400) as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 28-21-03 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
